recap_documents.description: Transcript regarding Hearing Held on 03/02/17 at 1:34 PM RE: Trial on Lehmans Objection to Claims of QVT (Doc # 17468 Debtors One Hundred Fifty-Fifth Omnibus Objection to Claims). Remote electronic access to the transcript is restricted until 6/22/2017. The transcript may be viewed at the Bankruptcy Court Clerks Office. [Transcription Service Agency: Veritext Legal Solutions.]. (See the Courts Website for contact information for the Transcription Service Agency.) (RE: related document(s) 17468). Notice of Intent to Request Redaction Deadline Due By 3/31/2017. Statement of Redaction Request Due By 4/14/2017. Redacted Transcript Submission Due By 4/24/2017. Transcript access will be restricted through 6/22/2017. (Cales, Humberto) (Entered: 03/24/2017)

caseName: VoterLabs Inc v. Ethos Group Consulting Services LLC

recap_documents.description: REPORT AND RECOMMENDATIONS-  re  59     Partial Motion to Dismiss Amended Complaint,  68     MOTION For Leave to File First Amended Counterclaim.  Please note that when filing Objections pursuant to Federal Rule of Civil Procedure 72(b)(2), briefing  consists solely of the Objections (no longer than ten (10) pages) and the Response to the Objections (no longer than ten (10) pages). No further briefing shall be permitted with respect to objections without leave of the Court.  Objections to R&R due by 11/2/2020. Signed by Judge Sherry R. Fallon on 10/19/2020. (lih) [Transferred from Delaware on 10/5/2021.]
